code: import axios from'axios';import{POST_URL,POST_DELETE_URL,POST_CREATE_URL,POST_EDIT_URL}from'./constants';import{getConfig}from'../utils/config';export const createPostApi=newPost=>{return axios.post(POST_CREATE_URL,newPost,getConfig());};export const deletePostApi=id=>{return axios.delete(POST_URL+id+POST_DELETE_URL,getConfig());};export const editPostApi=(id,content)=>{return axios.put(POST_URL+id+POST_EDIT_URL,{content:content},getConfig());};
